FuncDef: To add a description to a class map, policy map, or table map, use the description command. To remove the description, use the no form of this command.
ParentView: class map type network qos configuration mode
class map type qos configuration mode
class map type queuing configuration mode
policy map type network qos configuration mode
policy map type qos configuration mode
policy map type queuing configuration mode

ParaDef.Info: Description for the class map, policy map, or table map. The description can be a maximum of 200 alphanumeric characters.

Examples: switch(config-cmap-qos)# description This class map filters packets that matches an ACL
